articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Heroin Dealer Gets 10 Years in Prison in Death of Michael K. Williams - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Irvin Cartagena had pleaded guilty in April to conspiring to distribute drugs.
articles.content:
A New York City drug dealer was sentenced Friday to 10 years in prison for providing The Wire actor Michael K. Williams with fentanyl-laced heroin, causing his death.
